description:
Novak is one smoking hot dude! Kind of a super tall Justin Timberlake?
He is 6'5", lean but muscular, has an amazing engaging smile and personality. He seemed confident but not cocky in the slightest.
Novaks likes blonds with big tits, the bigger the better. Doesn't seem like a Player, even though he has devilishly good looks.
Speaking of playing, he played football, not basketball which I had imagined he would with his height. A sports injury to the shoulder knocked him from the game, and now he is using his body in a more creative ways for us.
I really like this guy. I don't know if he will ever do even an oral video, so enjoy his dynamic solo!
title: Novak - Solo
